greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Maximal run length in base 5 representation of n.
program: (PARI) A043279(n, b=5)={my(m,c=1); while(n>0, n%b==(n\=b)%b && c++ && next; m=max(m, c); c=1); m} \\ _M. F. Hasler_, Jul 23 2013
xref: Cf. A043276-A043290 for base-2 to base-16 analogs.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
